body: I'm working on this for another pull, Phil.

body: How far are we with this? The link shows a 404-error page.

If you go to http://jenkins.lncd.org:8080/job/CodeIgniter%20tests/ then go to Checkstyle Warnings

The latest build is pulled every 12 hours
I get a 404 here as well. It would be nice to see the progress of the docblocks as those ERR showing up are bothersome.
